channel.title: General Linear Modelling on Let's See What Happens When We Take Away The Puppy

item.title: Drawing A Line With Randomness: General Linear Models and Simulations
General Linear Model Simulation In R
item.description: Introduction I am currently planning a replication and extension of an experimental study that had a count-based dependent variable. The aim is to submit it as a registered report before collecting the data and so I need to have an analysis plan and estimated sample size/stopping rule. One of the ways that this can be achieved is by simulating the data that you expect to see if your hypothesis is correct.
